dct_description_sm: Map of Turkey and Cyprus; relief shown pictorially. Title in decorative cartouche. Text on verso: The description of Asia the Lesser, or Anatolia. From: Atlas, or A geographicke description of the regions, countries, and kingdomes of the world ... / translated by Henry Hexham. Amsterdam : Hondius and Iohnson, 1636.
dct_subject_sm: Aegean Islands (Greece and Turkey)—Maps—Early works to 1800
dcat_theme_sm: Aegean Islands (Greece and Turkey)—Maps—Early works to 1800
